name: iOS 16.3 and iPadOS 16.3
available: iPhone 8 and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 3rd generation and later, iPad 5th generation and later, and iPad mini 5th generation and later

advisories.available: iPhone 8 and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 3rd generation and later, iPad 5th generation and later, and iPad mini 5th generation and later
advisories.impact: An app may be able to bypass Privacy preferences
advisories.description: This issue was addressed with improved checks to prevent unauthorized actions.

cves.credit: Csaba Fitzl (@theevilbit) of Offensive Security and Mickey Jin (@patch1t)

advisories.available: iPhone 8 and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 3rd generation and later, iPad 5th generation and later, and iPad mini 5th generation and later
advisories.impact: An app may be able to access user-sensitive data
advisories.description: This issue was addressed by enabling hardened runtime.

cves.credit: Wojciech Reguła (@_r3ggi) of SecuRing (wojciechregula.blog)

advisories.available: iPhone 8 and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 3rd generation and later, iPad 5th generation and later, and iPad mini 5th generation and later
advisories.impact: A user may be able to read arbitrary files as root
advisories.description: A race condition was addressed with additional validation.

cves.credit: Cees Elzinga

advisories.available: iPhone 8 and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 3rd generation and later, iPad 5th generation and later, and iPad mini 5th generation and later
advisories.impact: Processing a font file may lead to arbitrary code execution. Apple is aware of a report that this issue may have been actively exploited against versions of iOS released before iOS 15.7.1.
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with improved handling of caches.

cves.credit: Apple

advisories.available: iPhone 8 and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 3rd generation and later, iPad 5th generation and later, and iPad mini 5th generation and later
advisories.impact: An app may be able to execute arbitrary code out of its sandbox or with certain elevated privileges
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with improved memory handling.

cves.credit: Austin Emmitt (@alkalinesec), Senior Security Researcher at Trellix Advanced Research Center

advisories.available: iPhone 8 and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 3rd generation and later, iPad 5th generation and later, and iPad mini 5th generation and later
advisories.impact: An app may be able to execute arbitrary code out of its sandbox or with certain elevated privileges
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with improved memory handling.

cves.credit: Austin Emmitt (@alkalinesec), Senior Security Researcher at Trellix Advanced Research Center

advisories.available: iPhone 8 and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 3rd generation and later, iPad 5th generation and later, and iPad mini 5th generation and later
advisories.impact: Processing an image may lead to a denial-of-service
advisories.description: A memory corruption issue was addressed with improved state management.

cves.credit: Meysam Firouzi @R00tkitSMM of Mbition Mercedes-Benz Innovation Lab, Yiğit Can YILMAZ (@yilmazcanyigit), and jzhu working with Trend Micro Zero Day Initiative

advisories.available: iPhone 8 and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 3rd generation and later, iPad 5th generation and later, and iPad mini 5th generation and later
advisories.impact: An app may be able to leak sensitive kernel state
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with improved memory handling.

cves.credit: Pan ZhenPeng (@Peterpan0927) of STAR Labs SG Pte. Ltd. (@starlabs_sg)

advisories.available: iPhone 8 and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 3rd generation and later, iPad 5th generation and later, and iPad mini 5th generation and later
advisories.impact: An app may be able to determine kernel memory layout
advisories.description: An information disclosure issue was addressed by removing the vulnerable code.

cves.credit: Pan ZhenPeng (@Peterpan0927) of STAR Labs SG Pte. Ltd. (@starlabs_sg)

advisories.available: iPhone 8 and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 3rd generation and later, iPad 5th generation and later, and iPad mini 5th generation and later
advisories.impact: An app may be able to execute arbitrary code with kernel privileges
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with improved memory handling.

cves.credit: Adam Doupé of ASU SEFCOM

advisories.available: iPhone 8 and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 3rd generation and later, iPad 5th generation and later, and iPad mini 5th generation and later
advisories.impact: The quoted original message may be selected from the wrong email when forwarding an email from an Exchange account
advisories.description: A logic issue was addressed with improved state management.

cves.credit: Jose Lizandro Luevano

advisories.available: iPhone 8 and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 3rd generation and later, iPad 5th generation and later, and iPad mini 5th generation and later
advisories.impact: An app may be able to bypass Privacy preferences
advisories.description: A logic issue was addressed with improved state management.

cves.credit: an anonymous researcher

advisories.available: iPhone 8 and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 3rd generation and later, iPad 5th generation and later, and iPad mini 5th generation and later
advisories.impact: A user may send a text from a secondary eSIM despite configuring a contact to use a primary eSIM
advisories.description: A logic issue was addressed with improved state management.

cves.credit: freshman

advisories.available: iPhone 8 and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 3rd generation and later, iPad 5th generation and later, and iPad mini 5th generation and later
advisories.impact: Visiting a website may lead to an app denial-of-service
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with improved handling of caches.

cves.credit: Adriatik Raci

advisories.available: iPhone 8 and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 3rd generation and later, iPad 5th generation and later, and iPad mini 5th generation and later
advisories.impact: An app may be able to access information about a user’s contacts
advisories.description: A privacy issue was addressed with improved private data redaction for log entries.

cves.credit: Wojciech Reguła of SecuRing (wojciechregula.blog) and Csaba Fitzl (@theevilbit) of Offensive Security

advisories.available: iPhone 8 and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 3rd generation and later, iPad 5th generation and later, and iPad mini 5th generation and later
advisories.impact: An app may be able to bypass Privacy preferences
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with improved memory handling.

cves.credit: Wojciech Regula of SecuRing (wojciechregula.blog), an anonymous researcher

advisories.available: iPhone 8 and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 3rd generation and later, iPad 5th generation and later, and iPad mini 5th generation and later
advisories.impact: Processing web content may lead to arbitrary code execution
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with improved memory handling.

cves.credit: Francisco Alonso (@revskills)

advisories.available: iPhone 8 and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 3rd generation and later, iPad 5th generation and later, and iPad mini 5th generation and later
advisories.impact: Processing maliciously crafted web content may lead to arbitrary code execution
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with improved checks.

cves.credit: ChengGang Wu, Yan Kang, YuHao Hu, Yue Sun, Jiming Wang, JiKai Ren and Hang Shu of Institute of Computing Technology, Chinese Academy of Sciences

advisories.available: iPhone 8 and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 3rd generation and later, iPad 5th generation and later, and iPad mini 5th generation and later
advisories.impact: Processing maliciously crafted web content may lead to arbitrary code execution
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with improved memory handling.

cves.credit: YeongHyeon Choi (@hyeon101010), Hyeon Park (@tree_segment), SeOk JEON (@_seokjeon), YoungSung Ahn (@_ZeroSung), JunSeo Bae (@snakebjs0107), Dohyun Lee (@l33d0hyun) of Team ApplePIE

advisories.available: iPhone 8 and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 3rd generation and later, iPad 5th generation and later, and iPad mini 5th generation and later
advisories.impact: An HTML document may be able to render iframes with sensitive user information
advisories.description: This issue was addressed with improved iframe sandbox enforcement.

cves.credit: Luan Herrera (@lbherrera_)
